title: Renegades
author: Craig Alanson
targetAudience: Young adults and adults who enjoy speculative fiction and action-packed narratives
relatedBooks: The Expanse Series by James S.A. Corey
Old Man's War by John Scalzi
The Forever War by Joe Haldeman
keyInsights: Exploration of moral dilemmas in conflict
The importance of camaraderie in adversity
The impact of rebellion against oppressive systems
